name: Fallacy (LunarlessStudios)
description:
A simple story about a man trying to find something he lost (or possibly never had to begin with).

Controls:

  • wasd (or arrows) to move
  • e (or left-click) to interact with the environment - specifically furniture, capsules, and keys
  • escape to quit

Github: https://github.com/N8BWert/Brackeys2022.1

Authors: Nathaniel Wert and Diego Alba
